pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This scenic video shows a paved road running through vast, green rice paddies. The sky is a brilliant blue, filled with large, fluffy white clouds, and rolling hills are visible in the distance. The camera moves forward along the road, offering a peaceful view of the rural landscape.
